title: Preview of new 'Star Wars' trailer debuting tonight
text:

Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Preview of new 'Star Wars' trailer debuting tonight Hoai-Tran Bui, USATODAY 6 p.m. EDT October 19, 2015 Rey (Daisy Ridley) and Finn (John Boyega) are prominent in the short teasers for the new trailer. (Photo: David James) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
A new Star Wars: The Force Awakens trailer is coming, and no one knows how to turn on the hype machine more than Disney. 
The Star Wars Instagram is calculatedly releasing brief -- and we mean brief -- teaser for their full-length third trailer of the anticipated Star Wars sequel directed by J.J. Abrams and starring Daisy Ridley, Oscar Isaac and John Boyega, as well as the original trio, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher and Harrison Ford. A video posted by Star Wars (@starwars) on Oct 18, 2015 at 12:01pm PDT 
The new teasers highlight the new trio of Rey, Finn and Poe Dameron, with each of them getting lingering glamour shots as BB-8 occasionally rolls around in the background. A video posted by Star Wars (@starwars) on Oct 19, 2015 at 10:00am PDT 
Though these shots are brief and have barely any new information, that doesn't mean we're not pumped enough to sit through a whole football game just to see the whole thing in its two to three-minute glory. 
The trailer will debut at halftime on ESPN's Monday Night Football at 8:15 ET/5:15 PT. Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1RSSuk2 TOP VIDEOS
